languages.text: "Да, шерин, это блестящая затея..." {n}Соблазнительно стрельнув глазами, Джай тут же зло морщится:{/n} "Проклятье! Нет, когда люди от ужаса прыгают в койку, это выглядит слишком уж жалко и отчаянно".

"Yes, shereen, that is a dazzling idea..." {n}Jae gives you a seductive look, then suddenly frowns.{/n} "Damn it! People jumping to bed together when they fear for their lives — no, it's too pathetic and desperate."
languages.original_text: "Да, шерин, это блестящая затея..." {n}Соблазнительно стрельнув глазами, Джай тут же зло морщится:{/n} "Проклятье! Нет, когда люди от ужаса прыгают в койку, это выглядит слишком уж жалко и отчаянно".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, shereen, that is a dazzling idea..." {n}Jae gives you a seductive look, then suddenly frowns.{/n} "Damn it! People jumping to bed together when they fear for their lives — no, it's too pathetic and desperate."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yes, shereen, that is a dazzling idea..." {n}Jae gives you a seductive look, then suddenly frowns.{/n} "Damn it! People jumping to bed together when they fear for their lives — no, it's too pathetic and desperate."

traits.locale_text: "Yes, shereen, that is a dazzling idea..." {n}Jae gives you a seductive look, then suddenly frowns.{/n} "Damn it! People jumping to bed together when they fear for their lives — no, it's too pathetic and desperate."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yes, shereen, that is a dazzling idea..." {n}Jae gives you a seductive look, then suddenly frowns.{/n} "Damn it! People jumping to bed together when they fear for their lives — no, it's too pathetic and desperate."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “是啊，亲爱的，这真是个美妙的主意……”{n}婕伊对你露出了妖媚的眼神，之后突然皱起了眉头。{/n}“真该死！一旦人们觉得自己性命难保，就会迫不及待地想滚床单——不行，这太可悲、太绝望了。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, shereen, that is a dazzling idea..." {n}Jae gives you a seductive look, then suddenly frowns.{/n} "Damn it! People jumping to bed together when they fear for their lives — no, it's too pathetic and desperate."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，亲爱的，这真是个美妙的主意……”{n}婕伊对你露出了妖媚的眼神，之后突然皱起了眉头。{/n}“真该死！一旦人们觉得自己性命难保，就会迫不及待地想滚床单——不行，这太可悲、太绝望了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「そうだね、シャリーン、それは…まばゆいばかりのアイデアだわ…」{n}ジェイはあなたに魅惑的な視線を送った後、突然顔をしかめた。 {/n}「ああ、もう！命の危険を感じてベッドに飛び込むなんて…ダメ、あまりにも哀れで、絶望的だわ」
languages.original_text: "Yes, shereen, that is a dazzling idea..." {n}Jae gives you a seductive look, then suddenly frowns.{/n} "Damn it! People jumping to bed together when they fear for their lives — no, it's too pathetic and desperate."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだね、シャリーン、それは…まばゆいばかりのアイデアだわ…」{n}ジェイはあなたに魅惑的な視線を送った後、突然顔をしかめた。 {/n}「ああ、もう！命の危険を感じてベッドに飛び込むなんて…ダメ、あまりにも哀れで、絶望的だわ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Sí, shereen, es una excelente idea...». {n}Jae te sonríe, seductora, y acto seguido frunce el ceño.{/n} «¡Maldición! Buscar una noche de pasión al temer por nuestras vidas... no, eso es el colmo del patetismo y la desesperación».
languages.original_text: "Yes, shereen, that is a dazzling idea..." {n}Jae gives you a seductive look, then suddenly frowns.{/n} "Damn it! People jumping to bed together when they fear for their lives — no, it's too pathetic and desperate."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, shereen, es una excelente idea...». {n}Jae te sonríe, seductora, y acto seguido frunce el ceño.{/n} «¡Maldición! Buscar una noche de pasión al temer por nuestras vidas... no, eso es el colmo del patetismo y la desesperación».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Oui, shereen, c'est une brillante idée... » {n}Jae vous lance un regard charmeur, mais fronce rapidement les sourcils.{/n} « Bon sang ! Se jeter l'{mf|un|une} sur l'autre, simplement parce qu'on a peur de mourir... Non, ce serait trop pitoyable et déprimant. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, shereen, that is a dazzling idea..." {n}Jae gives you a seductive look, then suddenly frowns.{/n} "Damn it! People jumping to bed together when they fear for their lives — no, it's too pathetic and desperate."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, shereen, c'est une brillante idée... » {n}Jae vous lance un regard charmeur, mais fronce rapidement les sourcils.{/n} « Bon sang ! Se jeter l'{mf|un|une} sur l'autre, simplement parce qu'on a peur de mourir... Non, ce serait trop pitoyable et déprimant. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ja, Shereen, umwerfende Idee ..." {n}Jae sieht dich verführerisch an, plötzlich runzelt sie die Stirn.{/n} "Verdammt! Leute, die zusammen ins Bett steigen, obwohl sie um ihr Leben fürchten – nein, das wirkt erbärmlich und verzweifelt."
languages.original_text: "Yes, shereen, that is a dazzling idea..." {n}Jae gives you a seductive look, then suddenly frowns.{/n} "Damn it! People jumping to bed together when they fear for their lives — no, it's too pathetic and desperate."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, Shereen, umwerfende Idee ..." {n}Jae sieht dich verführerisch an, plötzlich runzelt sie die Stirn.{/n} "Verdammt! Leute, die zusammen ins Bett steigen, obwohl sie um ihr Leben fürchten – nein, das wirkt erbärmlich und verzweifelt."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Evet şirinim, harikulade bir fikir." {n}Sana baştan çıkarıcı bir bakış atan Jae, ardından aniden kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Kahretsin! İnsanlar hayatlarını kaybedeceklerinden korktuklarında birlikte yatağa atlar. Hayır, bu fazlasıyla zavallıca ve umutsuzca."
languages.original_text: "Yes, shereen, that is a dazzling idea..." {n}Jae gives you a seductive look, then suddenly frowns.{/n} "Damn it! People jumping to bed together when they fear for their lives — no, it's too pathetic and desperate."

traits.locale_text: "Evet şirinim, harikulade bir fikir." {n}Jae sana baştan çıkarıcı bir bakış atıyor, ardından aniden kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Kahretsin! İnsanlar hayatlarını kaybedeceklerinden korktuklarında birlikte yatağa atlar. Hayır, bu fazlasıyla zavallıca ve umutsuzca."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
